Class MyQueryCallback

org.jbox2d.callbacks.QueryCallback
public class MyQueryCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jbox2d.callbacks.QueryCallback

The Class MyQueryCallback offers to keep track of the bodies that aren't in the display area anymore

See Also:
QueryCallback.reportFixture(org.jbox2d.dynamics.Fixture)
